description:
Markedness and implicational relationships in phonological development.

Phon is a software program that supports the building of textual and phonological data corpora. While it was originally created to support the study of child language development, Phon can be used ...

PhonBank is the child phonology component of the TalkBank system. TalkBank is a system for sharing and studying conversational interactions. PhonBank is supported by grant RO1-HD051698 from NIH-NICHHD to Brian MacWhinney and Yvan Rose. PHON is designed and built by Yvan Rose and Greg Hedlund. Currently available materials include:.

Phon is a software program that supports the building of textual and phonological data corpora.
name: PhonBank
